resources.string: Sea garden is the Bulgarian port city of Varna\'s largest, oldest and best known public park, also said to be the largest landscaped park in the Balkans. Located along the city\'s coast on the Black Sea, it is an important tourist attraction and a national monument of landscape architecture.

The botanical garden(also called eco park) is the first eco park in the country,which combines harmoniously artificial and natural eco systems.Its a very interesting place where you can take a familiarization of different kind of plants.

The cathedral is the largest and most famous Bulgarian Orthodox cathedral in the Bulgarian Black Sea port city of Varna, and the second largest in Bulgaria (after cathedral Alexander Nevski in Sofia). Officially opened on 30 August 1886.

Golden sands is a major seaside resort town on the northern Bulgarian Black Sea Coast, adjacent to a national park of the same name in the municipality of Varna.Located 17 km north of downtown Varna, it is virtually connected to the city by a continuous swath of resorts and villa communities.It is a popular tourist destination

The dolphinarium in Varna is located in the north part of the sea garden.Opens for the first time in 11 august 1984 and contains 1200 seats.There is a caffee shop inside with a transparent wall to the dolphin aquarium.

The Aladzha monastery is a medieval Orthodox Christian cave monastery complex in northeastern Bulgaria, 17 km north of central Varna and 3 km west of Golden Sands beach resort, in a protected forest area adjacent to the Golden Sands Nature Park.
Happy is a very popular restaurant in Varna. They are chain restaurants in the whole country.Their meals are delicious!
The sea terrace is a fancy restaurant located in the Officer beach(central beach) of Varna.If you have a business or an important meeting - that is your place.
Another fancy sea restaurant,they cook delicious and the restaurant has interesting building and interior.It\'s worth visiting.
Massa meals are known as very delicious and if you notice - all their interior is with a different chairs and tables and the atmosphere feels catchy.
Sardinia is a beach restaurant which is known with its delicious shells and meals.
Before few years the archaeological museum in Varna presented the oldest gold treasure in the world which was found in Bulgaria!You definitely should visit this place.
Founded in 1860 the ethnographical museum is a place which artifacts are agriculture,livestock,beekeeping,fishing,viticulture and crafts.
If you are interested in astronomy - that is the place you should go.Inside you can watch films about space,looking through a telescope etc.
The museum is located in Grand mall Varna.Here you can find old cars and statues of famous bulgarian people.
The national maritime museum also known as sea museum is founded in 1883.The museum exposition contains 1000 machines(helicopters, submarines,ships,torpedos etc).
Fichoza beach is located 17 km south of Varna.Its a very nice and clean place and there are a lot of restaurants in the beach.
Pasha Dere is a lovely place,a little bit far from Fichoza,which also is appropriate for camping because the forest is near the beach
Sunny day is a vacation complex located in the territory of St.st. Konstantin and Elena.If you are looking for peace and relaxation - that\'s your place.
Kranevo is a small village located 20 km north (after Golden sands).The sand is very fine,the clubs at the beach are creating a pleasant atmosphere.
Debut is a night club at the beach alley of Varna. When you pass near it you often will probably hear black music.The regular guests of the club are bulgarian rappers.
Punta cana is a night club,located at the south beach of Varna.They often organize thematic parties and almost all the time its full.
Xtravaganzza is a disco that invites artists daily. If you are planning to go there - make sure you have a reservation.
Arrogance is a disco located in Golden sands.They also invite artists and the disco contains three halls - house,hip-hop and chalga(this type of music stands for traditional bulgarian music)
If you love electronic music - La playa is your place. The location - south beach.
